Is the flute a musical instrument?	Yes.
Is the flute a musical instrument?	Yes.
Is the flute a musical instrument?	Yes
Is it possible to open flutes at one or both ends?	Yes.
Is it possible to open flutes at one or both ends?	Yes
Are Indian concert flutes available in standard pitches?	Yes.
Are Indian concert flutes available in standard pitches?	Yes
What do we refer musicians who play flute?	A flute player, a flautist or a flutist. 
What do we refer musicians who play flute?	A flute player, a flautist, or a flutist
When was a three-holed flute made from a mammoth tusk discovered?	2004.
When was a three-holed flute made from a mammoth tusk discovered?	In 2004
When did the tin whistle first appear?	12th century.
When did the tin whistle first appear?	In the 12th century
What are the oldest known musical instruments?	A three holed-flute made from a mammoth tusk and two flutes made from swan's bones.
What are the oldest known musical instruments?	A three-holed flute made from a mammoth tusk and two flutes made from swans' bones are among the oldest known musical instruments
When was the pan flute spread to other parts of Europe?	7th century BC.
When was the pan flute spread to other parts of Europe?	After the 7th century BC
What does the air stream across this hole create?	A Bernoulli, or siphon.
